title: Tin - leading companies worldwide based on production output 2017
yAxis: Production output in thousand metric tons
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Production output in thousand metric tons for 10 number of Largest Tin Producerss.
The maximum Production output in thousand metric tons 74.5 is found at Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China) and the minimum is found at Gejiu Zi-Li (China) where Largest Tin Producers is 8.7.
There is a difference of 65.8 between the maximum Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China) and minimum Largest Tin Producers Gejiu Zi-Li (China).

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Production output in thousand metric tons for 10 number of Largest Tin Producerss.
The Production output in thousand metric tons is appeared to be the highest at Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China) and lowest at Largest Tin Producers Gejiu Zi-Li (China).
Second maximum Production output in thousand metric tons is found at Largest Tin Producers .

Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China) is higher than any other Largest Tin Producerss with value 74.5, followed by , and Malaysia Smelting Corporation (Malaysia). Down to Largest Tin Producers Gejiu Zi-Li (China) with the lowest value 8.7.
